page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: This was written by{Andrew Richardson, a boy of 11. On Tuesday I got up at six o'clock and got ready for my paper round.At 7.30 I went to the paper shop by motor car. When I had delivered all of my papers I went home and watched breakfast time television.At 8.45am I went to school. First lesson was mathematics and we used our Alpha Beta books.At 10.30am it was playtime.Damian,Steven,Mark, and I played soccer.At the end of playtime it was English Comprehension. For dinner we had chips,beans and sausage and Angel Delight for afters. Our lessons continued until 3.45pm and then we went home.I watched television all evening.
